title: Kylie Jenner reacts as her singing to Stormi becomes a meme
text:
Who knew Kylie could hold a note? (Picture: Kylie Jenner, YouTube)

Kylie Jenner clearly has secret talents we didn’t know about, as a clip of the reality star singing to her daughter Stormi has gone viral becoming an actual meme.

The Keeping Up With the Kardashians star posted her long-awaited office tour video to her YouTube channel last week, and one part sees her serenading her one-year-old daughter in a bid to wake her from a nap.

Towards the end of the 16-minute video, Kylie walks over to Stormi’s personal bedroom in the sprawling Californian office.

After turning on the lights, Kylie finds the toddler sitting up in her crib before gently singing: ‘Rise and shine.’

Straight bars. Although it may come as a surprise but her vocals were pretty much in tune.

The short clip has gone completely viral with fans joking about using Kylie’s vocals as their alarm.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘How do I set Kylie Jenner singing “rise and shine” as my alarm tone in the morning?’ one asked somewhat seriously.

Stormi gets a personalised wake-up call after naps (Picture: Kylie Jenner, YouTube)

‘Kylie singing “rise and shine” had truly changed me in ways I cannot explain,’ another fan praised.

Clearly with a cheeky sense of humour, another weighed in: ‘I cannot stop thinking about the video of legendary and incomparable vocalist Kylie Jenner singing “rhiiiiiseee and shiiiiiine”.’

One Twitter user shared a gif of a woman performing interpretive dance to the tune of Kylie’s little jingle, while another joked that she’s had more ‘cultural impact’ than Ariana Grande.

Steady on, guys.

But perhaps the most important reaction of all was Kylie herself.

When a fan posted a clip of their electronic dance mash-up featuring Kylie’s ‘rise and shine’, the TV star replied only with four skull emojis so we’re not quite sure how she feels about her vocals becoming a meme.

But she probably loves it.

Kylie’s office tour is truly jaw-dropping as she takes us through the sprawling compound, that was once a shell but now boasts studios for photoshoots, dressing rooms, separate Kylie Cosmetics and Kylie Skin areas, a champagne vending machine and, of course, Stormi’s nursery.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘This space was nothing before we created this,’ she told viewers.

‘So it was just open space. There were no offices. It was amazing and such a blessing because we were able to really make it super personal to us.’

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Kylie Jenner has become a viral sensation after she sang Rise and Shine to wake up her daughter in her office tour.
